title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.7 - Amendments to comprehensive annual social services program plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.7 - Amendments to comprehensive annual social services program plan

State Regulations
(a) The social
services district may propose amendments to the district component of the final
comprehensive annual social services program plan. Amendments shall be prepared
and submitted to the department for approval. If an amendment is approved by
the department, the department will submit the amendment to the Governor for
approval of publication. The department will provide for a period of public
comment of at least 30 days following the date of initial
publication. (b) Department
amendments to the comprehensive annual social services program plan will be
instituted in a manner similar to that specified in subdivision (a) of this
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
401.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
